com.ge.dspmicro.device.api.config

Interface ICloudClient


  • public interface ICloudClient
    Interface for interactions with the cloud services.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      URL getExtraUploadServiceUrl()
      Gets the extra upload service url.
      List<String> getFolders()
      Get a list of folders defined for pushing.
      URL getPredixCloudServiceUrl()
      Gets the predix cloud service url.
      void pushConfigFolders()
      Push config folders to the cloud.

                       throws ConfigsPushException

      • getPredixCloudServiceUrl

        URL getPredixCloudServiceUrl()
        Gets the predix cloud service url.
        Returns:
